titleInfo.title: Letter from Charles Umpherston Aitchison, Foreign Department, Government of India Simla to Colonel Lewis Pelly

mods.abstract: Letter, dated 29 August 1873, asking Pelly to enquire of the eleven native doctors mentioned in correspondence with Colonel John Cheape Brooke in 1872 whether they are of the impression they will receive a pension.Enclosed with the letter is a report, dated 29 September 1873, written by Pelly reporting on the native Doctors and their expectations of receiving a pension, and citing the reasons and regulations given as to why they expect one.
